name: 100 Evil Men
description:
A short fps I made for Record Jam 2k23 https://itch.io/jam/record-collection-2k23 (I realized just now that it seems like this jam was mostly for physical games, but I hope this is still okay!)

Based on the Three Cheers for Sweet Revenge album by My Chemical Romance

Created using Godot Engine. As of now I can only upload a Windows version but I'll try my best to upload an HTML version sometime soon,  just want to be able to submit this project before the game jam deadline!

sound effects are from Zapsplat.com
